chapters.title: Oont Chala - ऊँट चला
chapters.content: This chapter tells the story of a camel walking in the desert. The camel moves in a rhythmic manner, and the children learn about the animal and its journey. The lesson also teaches them how to appreciate nature and animals.

chapters.title: Bhalu Ne Kheli Football - भालू ने खेली फुटबाल
chapters.content: This chapter talks about a bear playing football with other animals. It teaches children about teamwork and sportsmanship in a fun and engaging way.

chapters.title: Miyaun Miyaun - म्याऊँ म्याऊँ
chapters.content: This chapter is about the sounds animals make. The story focuses on a cat, which says 'Miyaun' and interacts with other animals. It's a fun way to learn about animal sounds.

chapters.title: Adhik Balvan Kaun? - अधिक बलवान कौन?
chapters.content: This chapter is about a competition to see who is the strongest among different animals. The story teaches children the importance of courage and strength in a playful manner.

chapters.title: Dost Ki Madad - दोस्त की मदद
chapters.content: In this chapter, a group of friends helps each other out of difficult situations. It teaches children the value of friendship and the importance of helping others.

chapters.title: Bahut Hua - बहुत हुआ
chapters.content: This chapter talks about a situation where something is going on for too long, and it needs to stop. It helps children understand the concept of limits and self-control.

chapters.title: Meri Kitab - मेरी किताब
chapters.content: The story is about a child who loves reading books and explores the joy of learning. The chapter emphasizes the importance of books and knowledge.

chapters.title: Titli Aur Kali - तितली और कली
chapters.content: This chapter tells the story of a butterfly and a flower. The interaction between the two teaches children about nature, growth, and the beauty of life.

chapters.title: Bulbul - बुलबुल
chapters.content: In this chapter, the story of a bulbul bird singing in a garden is told. The bird’s melody spreads joy, teaching children the significance of music in nature.

chapters.title: Meethi Sarangi - मीठी सारंगी
chapters.content: The story in this chapter talks about the sweet sound of the sarangi, an instrument. It explains how music can touch hearts and bring happiness.

chapters.title: Tesu Raja Beech Bazar - टेसू राजा बीच बाज़ार
chapters.content: This chapter is about a king who goes to the market. The story involves different characters and teaches children about the concept of leadership and helping others.

chapters.title: Bus Ke Neeche Bagh - बस के नीचे बाघ
chapters.content: This chapter is about a tiger hiding under a bus. It’s a funny and adventurous tale that teaches children about the importance of safety and caution.

chapters.title: Sooraj Jaldi Aana Ji - सूरज जल्दी आना जी
chapters.content: This chapter revolves around the sun and how it brings warmth and light. Children learn about the sun's importance and its impact on daily life.

chapters.title: Natkhat Chuha - नटखट चूहा
chapters.content: The story is about a mischievous mouse and its playful activities. It teaches children about the nature of animals and the concept of being mischievous.

chapters.title: Ekki Dokki - एक्की दोक्की
chapters.content: This chapter is a fun and playful story about two characters. It helps children understand the joy of play and friendship.
